text: Hugo Eugenio Ballesteros Reyes (3 January 1931 – 7 April 2019) was a Chilean politician and diplomat. He served as a member of the Senate from 1957 to 1965. He was also a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1969 to 1977. He served as his country's ambassador to the United Nations. He was born in Santiago, Chile. Ballesteros Reyes died of brain cancer on 7 April 2019 in Valparaíso. He was 88. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Chilean diplomats Category:Politicians from Santiago
title: Hugo Ballesteros Reyes
